hero.description: FAS-Solutions designs, builds, and scales SaaS platforms — from concept to launch. We also help other businesses bring their ideas to life.
services.label: WHAT WE DO
services.title: We build. We ship. We scale.
services.subtitle: From idea to production — we partner with businesses to design, develop, and launch SaaS platforms.
services.product_dev_desc: We take your idea from concept to a fully deployed SaaS product. Architecture, design, frontend, backend — end to end.
services.ai_desc: We embed intelligent AI into your products — from agentic workflows and RAG pipelines to LLM orchestration, predictive analytics, and smart automation.
services.custom_desc: We help companies build bespoke tools, internal platforms, and integrations that streamline operations. Whether it's payments, automation, or third-party APIs, we deliver tailored B2B software that matches your processes. No software solution is too small—or too complex.
services.cloud_desc: We architect and manage cloud infrastructure — CI/CD pipelines, containerization, monitoring, and auto-scaling for peak reliability.
services.data_desc: Turn raw data into actionable insights. We build dashboards, data pipelines, and reporting systems that drive smarter decisions.
services.consulting_desc: Already have a product? We help with architecture reviews, performance optimization, and scaling strategy.
values.label: WHY FAS-SOLUTIONS
values.title: Why teams choose us
values.subtitle: We're not just another dev shop. Here's what makes working with us different.
values.ownership_title: We Own It, Start to Finish
values.ownership_desc: No handoffs, no gaps. We take full responsibility from the first wireframe to production deployment — and stay to maintain, iterate, and scale your product as it grows.
values.security_desc: Security isn't an afterthought — it's our foundation. Every product ships GDPR-compliant, encrypted, and privacy-first. Built in Switzerland, held to the highest standards.
values.partner_desc: We don't disappear after delivery. We embed with your team — weekly standups, shared Slack channels, transparent roadmaps. Your goals are our goals.
values.launch_desc: We don't just write code — we ship products that generate business. YounitedTherapy is proof: conceived, built, and launched entirely by our team.
product.label: FLAGSHIP PRODUCT
product.desc1: YounitedTherapy is a secure, user-friendly online therapy platform designed to connect individuals with mental health professionals. Access support from anywhere with a private experience, flexible scheduling, and a smooth end-to-end journey from booking to sessions — still in dev and test mode.
product.desc2: Built with security, simplicity, and empathy at its core — YounitedTherapy demonstrates what FAS-Solutions can build: scalable, secure, user-first SaaS products.
product.scheduling_desc: Book appointments with licensed therapists in just a few clicks.
product.multilingual_desc: Available in English, German, French, Spanish, and Italian.
product.pipeline: More products in the pipeline. Stay tuned.
features.subtitle: Modern engineering practices, proven tech stacks, reliable delivery
features.scalable_desc: We design systems that grow with your business — microservices, cloud-native, API-first.
features.ux_desc: Every product we build is designed with the end user in mind — intuitive, fast, beautiful.
features.security_desc: GDPR-ready, encrypted by default, built with privacy at the core.
features.rapid_desc: Agile process with regular releases — from prototype to production in weeks.
features.multilang_desc: Internationalization baked in — we've shipped products in 5+ languages.
features.data_desc: Analytics, dashboards, and reporting built into every platform we deliver.
testimonials.title: What people are saying
testimonials.subtitle: From product users to development partners — hear from those we work with
resources.title: Dive In
resources.subtitle: Insights from our team — case studies, engineering deep-dives, and lessons learned from building SaaS products.
resources.article1_title: How we built YounitedTherapy from zero to launch
resources.article3_title: Setting up real-time video with end-to-end encryption
resources.article4_title: Lessons learned from internationalizing a SaaS platform
cta.title: Have an idea? Let's build it together.
cta.subtitle: Whether you need a full SaaS product, a custom tool, or expert guidance — we're here.
contact.label: GET IN TOUCH
contact.title: Let's talk about your project
contact.subtitle: Whether you have an idea for a new product, need technical expertise, or want to explore a partnership — we'd love to hear from you.
contact.message_placeholder: Tell us about your project, timeline, and any specific requirements...
contact.email_desc: Prefer email? Reach out any time — we typically respond within 24 hours.
contact.response_desc: We aim to respond to all inquiries within one business day.
work.flagship_desc: A comprehensive SaaS platform connecting individuals with licensed therapists. Secure video sessions, intelligent scheduling, Stripe-powered payments, and multilingual support — serving users across 5 languages.
work.fas_desc: Server-rendered Angular landing page with custom design system, AOS animations, and full SEO optimization.
work.ai_desc: Real-time analytics with AI-driven insights, predictive trends, and automated reporting for SaaS platforms.
work.coming_desc: New products across health-tech, fintech, and enterprise SaaS — currently in active development.
